source:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_SEQ_00<tab>Lisette de Valentione has her mitts full this Valentione's Day.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_SEQ_00<tab>※本クエストは、期間限定のクエストとなります。

ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂のリゼット・ド・ヴァレンティオンは、心配事があるようだ。

source:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_SEQ_01<tab>Kupka Kupp, emissary of ardor and affection, finds himself overtaxed this Valentione's Day. To aid in his deliveries, his postmoogle betters have provided him with a fledgling courier by the name of Pukty Piko who, unfortunately, is ignorant in the ways of the heart. This postmoogle's cynicism is so dire, in fact, it threatens to spoil these romantic festivities entirely. To rectify the situation, Lisette takes it upon herself to enlist both you and Astrid in the aid of this hopeless moogle. The two of you are to accompany Pukty as she makes her rounds, all the while instructing her in the myriad meanings of love. Having assented to this scheme, the postmoogle and her chocobo companion make for their first delivery at the Carpenters' Guild, where she awaits you.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_SEQ_01<tab>※本クエストは、シーズナルイベント開催中にかぎり、
　受注、進行できます。
　開催期間終了後は進行できませんので、ご注意ください。
　期間等の詳細についてはLodestoneをご覧ください。

リゼットたちと話した。アストリドとともに、プクティ・ピコの配達へ同行することになった。木工師ギルド付近にいる「プクティ・ピコ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_SEQ_02<tab>Upon your arrival, you discover that the recipient of the parcel is out on an errand. Pukty Piko, eager to get on with her other assignments, is only moments away from dropping the package right where she floats, but is successfully stopped by both you and Astrid. You convince the moogle that the gift must be hand-delivered, so you set off for the Botanists' Guild, where you blindly assume the carpenter has gone.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_SEQ_02<tab>プクティ・ピコと話した。園芸師ギルド付近にいる「プクティ・ピコ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_SEQ_03<tab>As predicted, you find the carpenter at the Botanists' Guild, where Pukty Piko at last makes good on the delivery. The once-surly man thanks you profusely, which leaves Pukty Piko perplexed: why such gratitude over a mere delivery? Astrid explains that joy, in all its forms, is meant to be shared with others, and that the man chose to impart some of his happiness to those who delivered his gift. The postmoogle appears receptive to this first lesson in love, and you set off for the next delivery at the Whistling Miller.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_SEQ_03<tab>プクティ・ピコと話した。口笛粉屋付近にいる「プクティ・ピコ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_SEQ_04<tab>Pukty Piko is shocked to find that her second parcel, delivered to an anxious girl, contained nothing more than rosy seashells and a simple card. The recipient, however, is overjoyed at the gift─an assurance of safety from a friend adventuring abroad, from whom she had been eagerly awaiting news. Pukty Piko thus learns that each person has their own unique way of sharing love and affection.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_SEQ_04<tab>プクティ・ピコと話した。アプカル滝付近にいる「プクティ・ピコ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_SEQ_05<tab>The third parcel, delivered to a man at Apkallu Falls, is a pair of earrings from Ul'dah intended as a birthday gift. The customer's excitement is palpable as he explains his desire to see his wife happy on her special day and share their remaining years together. His gratitude also inspires a strange sensation in Pukty Piko─which Astrid is pleased to inform her is none other than a form of love. With all three deliveries fulfilled and the moogle's inner life enriched, the time has come to return to Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_SEQ_05<tab>プクティ・ピコと話した。配達を通じて、プクティ・ピコはラブについて学ぶことができたようだ。ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂にいる「クプカ・クップ」に報告しよう。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_SEQ_06<tab>Kupka Kupp is ecstatic to hear of Pukty Piko's progress and to watch her blossom into the dutiful postmoogle of penned passions she was always meant to be. Bolstered by the steady growth his protégée has displayed, he admits he has another task for you all, one of a slightly more delicate nature.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_SEQ_06<tab>クプカ・クップに報告した。彼は、もうひとつ頼みたいことがあるのだという。再度「クプカ・クップ」に声をかけて、話を聞いてみよう。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Pukty Piko near the Carpenters' Guild.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_TODO_00<tab>木工師ギルド付近のプクティ・ピコと話す

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Pukty Piko near the Botanists' Guild.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_TODO_01<tab>園芸師ギルド付近のプクティ・ピコと話す

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Pukty Piko.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_TODO_02<tab>プクティ・ピコと話す

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Pukty Piko again.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_TODO_03<tab>プクティ・ピコと再度話す

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_TODO_04<tab>Report to Kupka Kupp.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_TODO_04<tab>クプカ・クップに報告

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_LISETTE_000_000<tab>'Tis the season of ardor and affection, and romance is thick upon the air! I, Lisette of House Valentione, entreat you, dearest one, to breathe deep and take love's richness─its cloying, rosy radiance─into your bosom!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_LISETTE_000_000<tab>冒険者さん、こんにちは～♪
ラブリーな愛の伝道師リゼットちゃんこと、
リゼット・ド・ヴァレンティオンでぇ～っす☆

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_LISETTE_000_001<tab>Hold now a moment, traveler. This face... Yes, I know it well! You are love's humblest servant. Ardor and adoration's foremost champion! Ah, what a delight it is to see you once again, and in such bless'd times as these.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_LISETTE_000_001<tab>ああっ、アナタはいつぞやの冒険者さん！
また会えて、大・感・激だゾッ♪

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_LISETTE_000_002<tab>Alas! Every rose has its thorns, and even this fairest of seasons is not without its trials. Indeed─trouble is afoot, and it threatens the hearts of all in this realm!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_LISETTE_000_002<tab>私たち、とっても心配なことがあってぇ……
冒険者であるアナタの腕を見込んで、頼みたいことがあるの。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_003<tab>Do you recall a moogle by the name of Kupka Kupp? Self-styled “munificent maestro of the myriad matters of the heart”? Heart-shaped pom? Ring any bells? Ah, excellent, for these woes we speak of are, specifically, his.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_003<tab>冒険者さん、前回の祝祭で知り合った、
ラブの配達士「クプカ・クップ」のことは覚えていますか？

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_004<tab>A fellow of ours, a moogle well-versed in the myriad matters of the heart, has found himself in quite the quagmire! The sweet thing of which we speak goes by the name of Kupka Kupp, and is an emissary of penned passions and all such billets-doux.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_004<tab>愛にまつわる贈り物を届けるラブの配達士であり、
私たちの仲間でもあるモーグリ族……
「クプカ・クップ」についてです。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_005<tab>Valentione's Day is a joyous occasion, but not always so for those who acquit themselves as postmoogles of the realm. Kupka Kupp has his poor paws full delivering heartwarming missives far and wide, hither and thither. Though he would never admit it, I fear he's at wits' end.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_005<tab>恋の祝祭、ヴァレンティオンデーの季節ということもあって、
彼の職業柄、今の時期は特に多忙なのですが、
どうにも限界が近そうで……。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_LISETTE_000_006<tab>But you, benevolent adventurer that you are, can provide precisely what our hirsute herald requires oh-so desperately! Pray, lend Kupka Kupp your talents and retrieve him from the edge whereupon his wits now teeter so precariously!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_LISETTE_000_006<tab>そ・こ・で！
冒険者さんに、クプカ・クップを助けてほしいの☆

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_Q1_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_A1_000_001<tab>A working adventurer is a happy adventurer!
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_A1_000_001<tab>労働万歳！

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_A1_000_002<tab>If I must.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_A1_000_002<tab>しかたないなぁ

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_007<tab>Marvelous! You are a hero through and through. Kupka Kupp will be so relieved. I shall fetch him at once!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_007<tab>ありがとうございます！
クプカ・クップを呼んできますね！

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_008<tab>Why, could it be...? So it is! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Returned again this year to aid us in another Valentione's Day celebration, have you? Once an emissary of love, always an emissary of love, kupo!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_008<tab>お久しぶりクポ！
前回のヴァレンティオンデーでは、お世話になったクポ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_009<tab>Ah! Why, yours is a face I know well. No introduction necessary, friends, for so renowned are you that I feel as if I have known you all my life. My postmoogle compatriots speak of your derring-do almost nightly, kupo. How they will bristle into puff balls when I tell them we are acquainted!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_009<tab>キミのことは知っているクポ！
腕利きの冒険者だって、お友達が言っていたクポ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_010<tab>Now then, I hear from Astrid that you would help me in my hour of need, for which I am most grateful. However, it is not the work itself that vexes me, but rather a colleague of mine─a clueless courier newly inducted into our vocation.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_010<tab>キミがお手伝いをしてくれるって話は聞いたけど、
モグが困っているのは仕事の量じゃないクポ。
厄介な「新米配達士」の扱いクポよ……。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_011<tab>Every Valentione's Day we emissaries are overtaxed, and this season has proven no exception. I had hoped to nip this issue in the bud by petitioning the deputy postmoogle for a helping paw or two. He obliged, but has sent someone altogether worthless...an undisciplined tyro!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_011<tab>この時期が忙しくなるのは、モグもわかっていたクポ。
だから、レターモーグリにお願いして、
助っ人を寄越してもらったクポ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_012<tab>To make matters worse, the daft thing is painfully ignorant in the ways of the heart. You should hear the way she speaks to the clientele─“What an ugly gift. Love <var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var> be blind,” and such nonsense. Left to her own devices, I fear she will ruin Valentione's Day, kupo!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_012<tab>助っ人が新米だったのは、まだいいクポ。
でも、「ラブとかよくわからない」なんて言うし、
受取人に余計なことを言って、ラブを壊したりするクポ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_013<tab>“Give the girl the axe,” you cry! The impulse is very much with me, I assure you, but I can't rightly turn away the very assistance for which I begged. I would come across as the most wretched ingrate to ever have wings. Yet I haven't the time to train her, let alone the patience!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_013<tab>かといって、せっかくの助っ人を追い返すのも悪いクポ。
モグはどうしたらいいと思うクポ……？

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_LISETTE_000_014<tab>Fret not, our harried herald! You are right to have sought our help, for I have come upon the cleverest of solutions to your predicament. We shall enlist the help of our doughty adventurer and House Valentione's very own Astrid to accompany said callous courier.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_LISETTE_000_014<tab>それなら、冒険者さんとアストリドがいれば大丈夫♪
ふたりが配達に同行すれば、解決すると思うなぁ☆

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_LISETTE_000_015<tab>You cannot be surprised at my suggestion. 'Tis a most natural fit! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, so skilled in so many subjects, will teach your assistant the delicate art of the post, while Astrid shall instruct the moogle in the ways of ardor and adoration. There! A splendid plan if I do say so myself.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_LISETTE_000_015<tab>冒険者さんは配達仕事のいろはを、
アストリドはラブのなんたるかを教える……
そうすれば、アナタも本来の仕事に集中できるでしょ♪

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_016<tab>Are you both sure you are up for the task? It isn't too great a bother?
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_016<tab>冒険者さん、アストリド。
本当に、お願いしてもいいクポ……？

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_017<tab>What a seasonable relief indeed, kupo! I shall bring her to you at once, for there is not a moment to lose!
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_017<tab>じゃあ、連れてくるクポ～！

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_018<tab>May I introduce to you my fledgling postmoogle charge, Pukty Piko, and her loyal chocobo, erm... Oh dear, this is rather awkward. I confess your friend's name has slipped my mind, kupo!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_018<tab>助っ人の新米配達士「プクティ・ピコ」クポ～！
いつも、お友達のチョコボと一緒に働いているクポ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_019<tab>Salutations one and all! As for my chocobo, his name can't have slipped your mind─because he hasn't one. I refer to him simply as “my partner dear,” or when I'm feeling particularly silly, “bird.”
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_019<tab>よろしくクポ。
それと、友達のことは「相棒」って呼んでいるクポよ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_100_019<tab>Many an acquaintance of mine has attempted to provide him a name or two, but none of them ever stick. Or should I say, I always forget them? In any case, you may call him whatever you like. It makes no difference, least of all to him.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_100_019<tab>知り合いのモーグリ族が相棒に名前をつけてくれたけど、
なんだか複雑な名前で、モグは覚えられなかったクポ。
だから、「相棒チョコボ」とか、好きに呼んでいいクポ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_BUDDYCHOCOBO_000_020<tab>Kweh, kweh!♪
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_BUDDYCHOCOBO_000_020<tab>クエッ、クエ～ッ♪

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_021<tab>Y-Yes, well, be that as it may, I have tasked Pukty Piko with three deliveries, all of which I would ask you to join her on.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_021<tab>プクティ・ピコには、配達を3件お願いしたから、
それに同行して、指導してほしいクポ～！

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_022<tab>These two are to accompany me? Very well. Who am I to turn away...whoever you are. Our first stop is the Carpenters' Guild─bird and I shall await you there.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_022<tab>1件目は「木工師ギルド」クポ。
配達先で指導役のふたりを待ってるから、
到着したら、モグに声をかけてほしいクポ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_LISETTE_000_023<tab>How fortunate Pukty Piko is to be joined by emissaries such as you and Astrid. For what better pair than you and she to teach a poor, benighted postmoogle the ways of ardor and affection─the pathways of the heart and soul!
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_LISETTE_000_023<tab>配達がんばってね～☆

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_024<tab>I've my own deliveries to attend to, I'm afraid, and cannot see this through to its conclusion. Know that all my thoughts and prayers go with you, though. Best of luck, kupo!
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_024<tab>モグはここで、他のお仕事をしておくクポ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_025<tab>Let's see how Pukty Piko acquits herself. Surely she can't be so terrible as Kupka described.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_025<tab>配達先が木工師ギルドということは、
職人さんへの届け物でしょうか……？

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_030<tab>Oh, the recipient is out on an errand or some such. A pity. As for the parcel, well...since no one is available to take it, I say we just leave it any old place. There are other assignments to be getting on with, after all.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_030<tab>受取人は、仕入れで留守だったクポ。
でも、ここで働いているのは間違いないし、
このあたりに荷物を置いて、2件目に向かうクポ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_031<tab>I say, now hold there a moment! I am no postmoogle, granted, but merely abandoning a package like this before a door seems a touch disrespectful, does it not? What we have here is a gift, an item crafted with love and care! It deserves to be treated as such. Who is this from, exactly?
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_031<tab>ちょ、ちょっと待ってください！
届け物は、誰からの贈り物なんですか？

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_032<tab>A young woman, if memory serves. Daughter to the man meant to receive this. Oh yes, and there was something about her training at the Culinarians' Guild, I think? My memory is hazy.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_032<tab>受取人の娘さんクポ。
たしか調理師ギルドで修行中……らしいクポ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_Q2_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_A2_000_001<tab>We ought to make the delivery in person.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_A2_000_001<tab>確実に受取人へ届けたほうがいい

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_A2_000_002<tab>We wouldn't want anyone to steal the parcel.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_A2_000_002<tab>置き配は盗難が心配……

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_033<tab>Hmmm, you make an interesting point.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_033<tab>なるほどクポ……。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_034<tab>The man is out on an errand, yes? And since he is with the Carpenters' Guild, it stands to reason he is out collecting lumber, and from the Botanists' Guild like as not. We shall start our search there, for a Valentione's Day gift must be delivered straight into the recipient's hands.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_034<tab>木工師の仕入れと言えば、材料である木材……
つまり、「園芸師ギルド」に行っている可能性が高いはず。
さっそく、探しに行ってみましょう！

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_035<tab>I believe we have found the man to whom the package was intended.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_035<tab>受取人の方、見つかったようですよ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSA04465_000_036<tab>Yes, what is it?
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSA04465_000_036<tab>俺に用か？

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_040<tab>A delivery for you, sir. You weren't at the guild when we came calling, so we took the liberty of tracking you down.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_040<tab>木工師ギルドにいないから、探したクポ。
届け物を持ってきたクポよ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSA04465_000_041<tab>All right, give it here, then. ...Oh, what's all this? Valentione's Day chocolate? Now this is a surprise.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSA04465_000_041<tab>おっ、ヴァレンティオンチョコか！

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSA04465_000_042<tab>My daughter's an apprentice in the Culinarians' Guild, you see. I'd heard she'd been selected to make the chocolates for the festivities this year, but I certainly didn't expect to receive any myself!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSA04465_000_042<tab>うちの娘は調理師ギルドで修行中なんだが、
今回、初めてヴァレンティオンチョコ作りに抜擢されてなぁ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_043<tab>And how wonderful that you did! It is not every day one's daughter is accorded the honor of crafting such a beloved confectionery. She must be quite the culinarian.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_043<tab>ヴァレンティオンチョコといえば、
期間限定の、調理師ギルドの目玉商品……
その製作を担うとは、腕のいい調理師さんなんですね！

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSA04465_000_044<tab>That she is. My pride and joy, that girl. What a pleasant surprise this package was. Certainly made my day! I can't thank you enough for bringing it all the way out to me like you have. I'll never forget this kindness.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSA04465_000_044<tab>自慢の娘だ。
このチョコを励みに、俺もがんばらないとな。
ここまで持ってきてくれて、本当にありがとよ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_045<tab>Goodness... Seems like a bit of an overreaction to being handed some food, doesn't it?
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_045<tab>ここまで持ってきただけで、なんであんなに喜ぶクポ？

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_Q3_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_A3_000_001<tab>He appreciated that we delivered it with care.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_A3_000_001<tab>気遣いが伝わった

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_A3_000_002<tab>That's what savvy postmoogles call “customer satisfaction, kupo”!
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_A3_000_002<tab>誠実な仕事をしたから

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_046<tab>Agreed. There is a lesson to be learned here, Pukty. Joy is not meant to be kept to oneself─it is a feeling that yearns to be shared. And we played a part in bringing him happiness, so it is little wonder that he wished to share his felicity with us.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_046<tab>嬉しいことは、誰かに話したくなるもの……
ここまで届けたから、私たちは話し相手になれました。
そこで共感が得られると、さらなる喜びに繋がるんですよ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_047<tab>So, joy is meant to be shared? Hmmm... Well, when you put it that way, I suppose that's not so foreign a concept. When something makes me smile or laugh, I do tend to talk my companion's ear off about it, and I'm often made the happier for it!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_047<tab>……いいことがあると、
モグも相棒に話したくなるクポ。
それはちょっと、わかる気がするクポ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_BUDDYCHOCOBO_000_048<tab>(-Bird-)Kweh!
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_BUDDYCHOCOBO_000_048<tab>(-相棒チョコボ-)クェーッ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_049<tab>But enough about that─time is wasting! Best be off on our next delivery. The recipient awaits at the Whistling Miller, by the looks of it.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_049<tab>次は「口笛粉屋」に向かうクポ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_050<tab>I'm slightly concerned for our fair recipient. She appears to be in a state.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_050<tab>受取人の方、心配そうですね。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSB04465_000_051<tab>I wonder...how are you doing, wherever you are? I wish I could hear of your travels, your adventures. It's been ages since I last had word from you.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSB04465_000_051<tab>あの子、元気だといいけど……。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_055<tab>Pardon me, but I've a delivery for you, ma'am.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_055<tab>届け物を持ってきたから、受け取ってほしいクポ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSB04465_000_056<tab>For me? Oh, it's from one of my dearest companions. And look what they've sent. Pink seashells! Are they not extraordinary? Look at their vibrancy. Ah, and a card. “Happy Valentione's Day.” How delightful.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSB04465_000_056<tab>よかった、友達からだわ！
綺麗な桃色の貝殻と手紙が……
「ハッピーヴァレンティオン」ですって。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_057<tab>Shells? Empty ones? You can't even eat those. At least the other fellow received chocolate...
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_057<tab>……え？
それだけクポ？

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_058<tab>P-Pukty! That is abominably rude! You must forgive our friend here. She is not accustomed to deliveries such as these.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_058<tab>失礼なことを言って、ごめんなさい！
この子、新人で……。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSB04465_000_059<tab>There's nothing to forgive, I assure you. I could hardly be upset after receiving a gift like this, and from a loved one I've not seen in quite some time.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSB04465_000_059<tab>ふふ、たったこれだけでも、私には十分なの。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSB04465_000_060<tab>My friend, you see, is an adventurer in their own right. They enjoy being cryptic, though, and never outright tell me where they have been. Rather, they make me guess by dropping hints in the form of curiosities such as these.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSB04465_000_060<tab>友達は冒険者でね、
季節ごとに、旅先で手に入れた品を送ってくれるのよ。
贈られた品を見れば、近況もなんとなくわかるわ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSB04465_000_061<tab>What a blessing this parcel is. I was only just wondering how they were faring and where their journeys had brought them. Thank you, Ms. Postmoogle. You have brightened my day!
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSB04465_000_061<tab>届け物を持ってきてくれて、ありがとう！

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_062<tab>Love is a mystery, indeed. And a funny one at that.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_062<tab>ラブの謎が深まったクポ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_063<tab>It is my pleasure to tell you, Pukty, that love is a many-splendored thing, and we each have our own unique way of expressing it. The friendship between that girl and her adventurer companion is a perfect example. That gift, which appeared mere frippery to you, was a treasure in her eyes!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_063<tab>愛情の表し方は、ひとそれぞれですから……
親しい間柄だからこそ、あの方には伝わったのでしょう。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_Q4_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_Q4_000_000<tab>何と言う？

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_A4_000_001<tab>It's important for adventurers to check in with their loved ones.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_A4_000_001<tab>生存報告は大事

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_A4_000_002<tab>Perhaps her friend is in La Noscea.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_A4_000_002<tab>ラノシアにいるのかな？

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_A3_000_003<tab>Perhaps her friend is traveling the Ruby Sea.
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_A3_000_003<tab>紅玉海を旅しているのかも

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_064<tab>It is oft said that no news is good news, but I very much doubt that to be the case for those in your line of work.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_064<tab>「便りの無いのは良い便り」なんて言いますが、
冒険者の方だと、そうも言っていられませんよね。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_065<tab>I suspect you may be right. Outside of a few specialty traders, seashells of that quality and color cannot be easily found in the landlocked regions of the realm, after all.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_065<tab>そうかもしれません！
桃色の貝殻からは、お友達が海辺を旅していることが、
自然と伝わってきますね。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_066<tab>So you mean to say...this was her friend's way of telling that young woman that all is well? Their way of assuaging any worries she might be harboring about their safety? Hmmm, how fascinating.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_066<tab>つまり、冒険者流の、
元気に旅をしているっていう報告クポ？

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_067<tab>To be sure, were I to be separated from my bird here by expansive seas or vast mountain ranges, I'd like to hear from him, from time to time. Perhaps not every day. That would be irksome. But...to know that he's in good health would be not altogether disagreeable, I suppose.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_067<tab>……もし、相棒と離れ離れになったら
モグも、元気にしてるか気になるかもしれないクポ。
ちょっとでも連絡があったら、嬉しい……なるほどクポ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_068<tab>Anywho, no sense in losing ourselves in thought, not when a parcel sits burning a hole in my satchel, kupo! Our next delivery takes us to Apkallu Falls. Let's away!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_068<tab>それじゃ、次の配達が最後クポ。
受取人は「アプカル滝」のあたりにいるらしいクポ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_069<tab>This will be our third and final delivery of the day. Goodness, I don't know how these moogles do it!
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_069<tab>配達は、この方で最後ですね。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSC04465_000_070<tab>Really, they ought to be here by now. Don't tell me my gift has fallen afoul of bandits on its journey here!
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSC04465_000_070<tab>そろそろ届くはずなんだが……。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_075<tab>Greetings, sir. I have for you here a parcel from one of Ul'dah's preeminent art dealers, kupo!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_075<tab>ウルダハの美術商から、
届け物を持ってきたクポ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSC04465_000_076<tab>At last! Her earrings, they've arrived! ...Goodness gracious. How stunning they are. This craftsmanship, this meticulous attention to detail! I couldn't have hoped for a better present for my wife. She'll be over the moon to receive them.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSC04465_000_076<tab>おお……見事なイヤリングじゃないか！
妻の誕生日が近くてね、装身具をひとつ頼んでいたんだ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSC04465_000_077<tab>Her birthday is coming up, you see, and I wanted to ensure her special day is just that. I've even given Kupka Kupp's pom a vigorous pat─I hear tell that one touch is enough to bring a couple happiness for all their years to come. Let us hope so!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSC04465_000_077<tab>これからも夫婦仲良く過ごせるようにと、
クプカ・クップさんのポンポンに願掛けもした。
あとはこれを渡すだけ……喜んでもらえるといいなぁ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSC04465_000_078<tab>You did well to bring these all the way out here without a scratch on them, you know. I'd begun to worry that by the time I received them, the poor things would be nothing more than scuffed, dented rocks. You've got a bright future ahead of you in the postal service, friend. Thank you.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_RESIDENTSC04465_000_078<tab>傷がないのは、丁寧に運んでくれた証だね。
どうもありがとう……配達の仕事、がんばって！

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_079<tab>Now this is odd. There's a flutter in my chest. A tickle in my stomach, kupo! Have I taken ill...or do compliments and words of gratitude always elicit this sort of response?
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_079<tab>胸のあたりが、ポカポカするクポ。
お礼と応援、ホッコリするクポ……不思議クポね。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_080<tab>Trust me when I say you are <var 1A 02 /var>not<var 1A 01 /var> ill, Pukty. That flutter you feel, those ticklish sensations you described? That is fondness─a form of love, indeed─and it was made manifest by that man's appreciation for what you provided.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_080<tab>愛の「おすそわけ」をもらったんですよ。
あの方が配達を通じて受け取った喜びや愛情が、
プクティ・ピコへの言葉にも表れていたんだと思います。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_081<tab>Oh, so this love nonsense─why, it isn't nonsense at all, is it! It's quite wonderful, actually! I liken it to...that feeling when my bird and I settle down for an afternoon nap in the Twelveswood! When I tuck myself under his wing and we are warmed by the sunlight breaking through the trees.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_081<tab>なるほど……ラブって、いいものクポね。
相棒とお昼寝したときみたいに、ポカポカになるクポ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_082<tab>Perhaps you haven't mastered the concept entirely, but I do believe we are making strides in the right direction! You certainly seem more attuned to the ways of the heart than when we first made your acquaintance, at any rate.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_082<tab>ふふ、少しずつラブの何たるかが、
プクティ・ピコにもわかってきたみたいですね。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_083<tab>Now that all three parcels have reached the right hands, let us return to Mih Khetto's Amphitheatre. No doubt Kupka Kupp is anxious to know how Pukty fared.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_083<tab>とにかく、これで依頼されたお仕事は完了です。
ミィ・ケット野外音楽堂へ戻って、
配達の成果を「クプカ・クップ」に報告しましょうか。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_LISETTE_000_084<tab>Ah, our emissaries of ardor and affection are returned to us. I trust all is well in the hearts of the realm? Does the language of love still elude our perplexed postmoogle?
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_LISETTE_000_084<tab>配達おつかれさま♪

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_0085<tab>Though I can't say for certain, I believe I'm beginning to understand why everyone is always nattering on and on about this “love” business. Its  mysteries are a little less, well, mysterious!
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_0085<tab>ラブのこと、ちょっとだけわかったクポ。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_086<tab>Let us inform Kupka Kupp of our efforts. I am sure he is on pins and needles!
target: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_086<tab>配達の成果を「クプカ・クップ」に報告しましょう！

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_090<tab>Here they are, our agents of affection! Our heralds of the heart! Returned at last, and not before time, kupo! Tell me, how went your deliveries?
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_090<tab>おかえりクポ～！
配達はどうだったクポ？

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_092<tab>Splendid, each and every one. The recipients were all thrilled to receive their parcels, and I'm pleased to say that Pukty Piko learned something along the way.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_ASTRID_000_092<tab>みなさん喜んでいましたよ。
プクティ・ピコも、感じるところがあったようですし。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_093<tab>Yes, I do believe I did. Love is...well, it's quite a bit more complicated than I first imagined it to be. There are hidden depths to it, ones I didn't see before. I may not be an expert on the subject yet, but I would like to think my ignorance is not quite as dire as it once was.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_PUKTYPIKO_000_093<tab>ふたりのおかげで、
少しはラブのことがわかってきた気がするクポ……。

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_094<tab>You are making progress, certainly! I am glad of it. And just so long as you did not offend anyone, I could not ask for more. Anywho, I am indebted to you, Astrid, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. You have spared at least three citizens of the realm from potential cruelty, however unintended it may have been!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_094<tab>おお……プクティ・ピコの指導をしてくれて、
本当にありがとうクポ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_095<tab>No, I am being too harsh. Pukty, you have shown a true, concerted effort to understand the labyrinthian complexities of the heart. And as a reward, I am inclined to set to you another task!
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_095<tab>……よし、今のプクティ・ピコたちなら、
あれを任せても大丈夫なはずクポ！

source: TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_096<tab>For in truth, your work is not yet finished. Much more is there to be done this Valentione's Day, kupo! When you've the time, speak with me again, and I shall tell you all about it.
target:
TEXT_FESVLT801_04465_KUPUKAKOPP_000_096<tab>実は、あともうひとつ、頼みたいことがあるクポ。
時間があれば、モグに声をかけてほしいクポ～！
